merchant.name: Sinfonia Ristorante - Victoria Memorial Hall
merchant.description:
Sinfonia Ristorante provides an excellent dining experience that offers a wide selection of delectable dishes using quality seasonal ingredients that definitely gives satisfaction to every customer. Located at Victoria Concert Hall and just a few minutes away from Raffles Place MRT Station, Sinfonia Ristorante has a cozy atmosphere with its unique, artistic style and a touch of elegance in their decors that is sure to be the perfect place to enjoy every moment in dining. MUST TRIES: Indulge in the pleasure of their mouth-watering dishes such as Handmade Trofie, Fresh Crab Meat, Wild Smoked Duck, Mediterranean Herbs, Green Asparagus, Poached Egg, Taleggio, Black Truffle, Pecorino Cheese, 3 style Roasted Cabbage, Scallops, Beef Short Ribs, Chestnut, Salmon Roe, Horseradish and so much more. For drinks, they offer wine by glass, champagne, sparkling wine, Italian white, Italian red, sweet to enhance your dining experience. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com

sofConfiguration.tips: For orders less than Rp70.000 for this restaurant, a small order fee applies.

iconContent.title: Small order fee
iconContent.desc: For order less than Rp70.000, a small order fee of Rp3.000 applies.
